metadata.title: CVE-2018-19756 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
There is a heap-based buffer over-read at stb_image.h (function:stbi__tga_load) in libsixel 1.8.2 that will cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsixel-bin - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel-examples - 1.8.2-2.1
libsixel1 - 1.8.2-2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsixel package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.2-2.1').
